content.rendered:
Financial calendar for Aqualis ASA

FINANCIAL YEAR 2017
27.02.2018 – Quarterly Report – Q4

FINANCIAL YEAR 2018
26.04.2018 – Quarterly Report – Q1
20.07.2018 – Half-yearly Report
25.10.2018 – Quarterly Report – Q3

14.05.2018 – Annual General Meeting

The dates are subject to change.

For further information, please contact:

Kim Boman, CFO
+47 959 63 912
kim.boman@aqualis.no

This information is published pursuant to the requirements set out in the Continuing obligations.
